trans-unit.target: 农业经理

trans-unit.source: An
trans-unit.target: An

trans-unit.source: Built-in testing of program modules ensuring integrity of the system.
trans-unit.target: 内置程序模块测试,确保系统的完整性。

trans-unit.source: Framework for developing crop simulation models, includes an implementation of the WOFOST and LINTUL crop simulation models.
trans-unit.target: 开发作物模拟模型的框架,包括实施WOFOST和LINTUL作物模拟模型;

trans-unit.source: Full documentation is available on http://pcse.readthedocs.io
trans-unit.target: Full documentation is available on http://pcse.readthedocs.io

trans-unit.source: Implementation in pure python with dependencies only on popular packages available from the Python Package Index (PyPI) (
trans-unit.target: 在纯Python中实现,只依赖Python包索引(PyPI)中的流行包。

trans-unit.source: In general, with low-level languages like FORTRAN, simple things already take many lines of code and mistakes are easily made, particularly by agronomists and crop scientist that have limited experience in developing or adapting software.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,使用FORTRAN这样的低级语言,简单的事情已经需要很多行代码,而且很容易出错,特别是农艺师和作物科学家,他们开发或改造软件的经验有限。

trans-unit.source: Input/Output is completely separated from the simulation model itself. Therefore PCSE models can easily read from and write to text files, databases and scientific formats such as HDF or NetCDF.
trans-unit.target: 输入/输出与仿真模型本身完全分离。因此,PCSE模型可以很容易地从文本文件、数据库和科学格式(如HDF或NetCDF)中读取和写入。

trans-unit.source: Modular design allowing you to add or change components relatively quickly with a simple but powerful approach to communicate variables between modules.
trans-unit.target: 模块化设计允许你相对快速地添加或更改组件,并采用简单而强大的方法在模块之间进行变量通信。

trans-unit.source: PCSE is a framework developed for implementing crop simulation models developed in Wageningen. Many of the Wageningen crop simulation models were originally developed in FORTRAN77 or using the FORTRAN Simulation Translator (FST). Although this approach has yielded high quality models with high numerical performance, the inherent limitations of models written in FORTRAN is also becoming increasingly evident:
trans-unit.target: PCSE is a framework developed for implementing crop simulation models developed in Wageningen. Many of the Wageningen crop simulation models were originally developed in FORTRAN77 or using the FORTRAN Simulation Translator (FST). Although this approach has yielded high quality models with high numerical performance, the inherent limitations of models written in FORTRAN is also becoming increasingly evident:

trans-unit.source: PyYAML
trans-unit.target: PyYAML

trans-unit.source: SQLAlchemy
trans-unit.target: SQLAlchemy

trans-unit.source: Similar to FST, it enforces good model design by explicitly separating parameters, rate variables and state variables. Moreover PCSE takes care of the module initialization, calculation of rates of changes, updating of state variables and actions needed to finalize the simulation.
trans-unit.target: Similar to FST, it enforces good model design by explicitly separating parameters, rate variables and state variables. Moreover PCSE takes care of the module initialization, calculation of rates of changes, updating of state variables and actions needed to finalize the simulation.

trans-unit.source: The models rely on file-based I/O which is difficult to change. For example, interfacing with databases is complicated in FORTRAN.
trans-unit.target: 这些模型依赖于基于文件的I/O,很难改变。例如,在FORTRAN中与数据库的接口很复杂。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the models is often rather monolithic and the different parts are very tightly coupled. Replacing parts of the model with another simulation approach is not easy.
trans-unit.target: 模型的结构往往是比较单一的,不同的部分是非常紧密耦合的。用另一种模拟方法来代替模型的各个部分是不容易的。

trans-unit.source: To contribute to PCSE, you can fork your own copy at https://github.com/ajwdewit/pcse
trans-unit.target: To contribute to PCSE, you can fork your own copy at https://github.com/ajwdewit/pcse

trans-unit.source: To overcome many of the limitations above, the Python Crop Simulation Environment (PCSE) was developed which provides an environment for developing simulation models as well as a number of implementations of crop simulation models. PCSE is written in pure python code which makes it more flexible, easier to modify and extensible allowing easy interfacing with databases, graphical user interfaces, visualization tools and numerical/statistical packages. PCSE has several interesting features:
trans-unit.target: 为了克服上述许多限制,开发了Python作物模拟环境(PCSE),它提供了一个开发模拟模型的环境,以及一些作物模拟模型的实现。PCSE是用纯Python代码编写的,这使得它更灵活,更容易修改和扩展,允许与数据库、图形用户界面、可视化工具和数字/统计软件包轻松对接。PCSE有几个有趣的特点。

trans-unit.source: Tools are available for reading parameter and weather files from existing models to have as much backward compatibility as possible.
trans-unit.target: 有工具可用于从现有模型中读取参数和天气文件,以尽可能的向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: and
trans-unit.target: そして

trans-unit.source: module which allows to define the agromanagement actions that happen on a farmers field. Such actions can be specified as events based on time or model state.
trans-unit.target: 模块,可以定义农民田间的农业管理行动。这些行动可以被指定为基于时间或模型状态的事件。
